chat.imageinfo: If image-related tasks are complete, please switch back to a text LLM for standard queries to get better response.

attach.title: Attach temporary files for special queries
attach.summary_tips: Attach up to 3 documents (PDF, DOCX, TXT) for summarization and querying.
attach.data_tips: Attach up to 1 tabular file (XLSX, CSV) formatted as a table, with the first row containing column headers and subsequent rows containing data.
attach.images_tips: Attach up to 3 images (PNG, JPEG, JPG) to extract details and perform queries. Requires a vision model such as Phi-3.5-vision.
attach.resume_tips: Attach resumes (PDF, DOCX, TXT) followed by a job description prompt for evaluation and further queries.
attach.clear_tips: Exit special queries and continue with the common knowledge base.

user.notice: If image-related tasks are complete, please switch back to a text LLM for standard queries to get better response.
user.subwelcome: How can I help you today?

topbar.title: About
topbar.content_part_1: This assistant is based on the Intel ® Assistant. Builder framework. The assistant has been optimized to use the AI PC capabilities of the hardware in this computer. Visit
topbar.content_part_3: for the latest AI PC information and product availability.

alert.title: is not supported

alert.part_3: CPU: Intel® Core™ Ultra processor Series 2 (former Lunar Lake)

steps.title: Here are the steps that we follow to prepare the models:
steps.step1: First, you need to install the HuggingFace's Optimum package with the OpenVINO support:
steps.step2: The current framework requires transformers version 4.40.1:
steps.step3: Then, use the following command to download and quantize the model using an int4 symmetric format:
steps.step3_note: where <1><MODEL_ID></1> corresponds to the HuggingFace's model id and <1><OUTPUT></1> is the path where the generated OV model will be stored.
steps.step4: For LLMs, we can use <1>--task text-generation-with-past</1>, and will need <1>group_size</1>, <1>sym</1> and <1>ratio</1> etc parameters 😊
steps.step5: For the case of the embedder and reranker models the procedure is very similar to the LLM with the difference that in these cases we need to specify the task type. In this case we are applying a quantization of int8.
steps.step6: Upload your model using the "Upload Model" button in the settings panel. When preparing the model zip file for upload, ensure that the folder directly contains the files without any subfolders, as shown in the following example.
